name: Play Not With Food They Said
name_original: Play Not With Food They Said
description:
They told you not to play with food but you knew better.

Now stop the cows from infinite spawning!

--------------------------------------------------------------------------

Made for #LDJAM. 

Use your mouse. Play with food. Pop the yellow balls.

--------------------------------------------------------------------------

Game inspired by a dream that 88ukiyo had the courtesy to share.

Design, Graphics, Coding and SFX by axoona.

Music Track from https://www.bensound.com.

VFX : Particle Effects by Diamond Fox @ Asset Store Unity
